response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily life significantly. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's designed to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional value and versatility, I'm offering it to you today for $150. This special price is exclusive to this offer and represents an excellent opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a competitive rate. I'm confident it will bring immense value to your life. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about how it can be a perfect fit for you.", "product_price": 150}
